job.title: Principal Software Engineer ( TS/SCI)
job.description:
If you are a Principal Software Engineer ( TS/SCI) with experience, please read on!
We are a leading national company that focuses on helping segments off the government improve their software and build great new products. This role will be focused on the geo-spatial world!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Chance to work on very interesting projects using the latest in technology!
We offer a strong relocation package
Great compensation package!
Chance to make an impact on the world.
Great leadership team and culture!
What You Will Be Doing
You will be developing and implementing software applications for the geo-spatial world
You will be writing test scripts, test driven development in an agile environment
You will be creating, testing and maintaining software products to ensure strong functionality.
You will be working with and training junior developers.
What You Need for this Position
Must have a TS/SCI clearance!
Experience with Java/python
Experience with Javascript
Micro-service architecture and design
So, if you are a Principal Software Engineer ( TS/SCI) with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Keith.Ellis@CyberCoders.com
Keith Ellis - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
